page.title: 02WHERE I LIVE
page.content: I live in Hardgate which is a small village not all that far from the other village of Haugh of Urr. The village is mostly on a slope and there is usually a field behind or beside most of the houses. My house is called the 'Auld Kirk' because it used to be a church and you can still see the old windows which used to be of stained glass. The house is white washed with three doors leading out: the kitchen door, the front door and the garage door. The garage is fairly big, it contains a bathroom and a store room. In the actual house there is another bathroom, a sitting room, one downstairs bedroom and two upstairs bedrooms. I like living here because there are plenty of places to go to get away from it all.
